properties.areaDesc: Western Nevada Basin and Range including Pyramid Lake
properties.headline: Lake Wind Advisory issued February 1 at 2:02PM PST until February 2 at 7:00PM PST by NWS Reno NV
properties.description:
* CHANGES...None.

* WHAT...Northwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 40 mph.
Wave heights of 2 to 4 feet.

* WHERE...Western Nevada Basin and Range including Pyramid Lake.

* WHEN...From 10 AM to 7 PM PST Sunday.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Another round of breezy winds is expected
on Monday during the afternoon.

* IMPACTS...Small boats, kayaks and paddle boards will be prone
to capsizing and should remain off lake waters until
conditions improve.
properties.instruction:
Check lake conditions before heading out and be prepared for a
sudden increase in winds and wave heights. Consider postponing
boating activities on the lake until a day with less wind.

NWSheadline: LAKE WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM TO 7 PM PST SUNDAY FOR PYRAMID LAKE
